trans-unit.source: Provides an editor control that enables end users to edit several user interface (UI) properties on an associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个编辑器控件，使最终用户能够编辑多个关联的用户界面 (UI) 属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart class is an editor control that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class, and is used to edit properties that affect the appearance of an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control.
trans-unit.target: AppearanceEditorPart 类是派生自一个编辑器控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>类，并用于编辑影响相关联的外观的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或其他服务器控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart control enables end users to edit several UI properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: AppearanceEditorPart 控件使最终用户能够编辑的多个 UI 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The type of control that appears in the page to edit each property value is listed in the adjacent cell of the following table.
trans-unit.target: 将显示在页后，可以编辑每个属性值的控件的类型是相邻的单元格的下表中列出的。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Control used to edit property| |--------------|-----------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is used to set the text for the title.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select what type of title-and-border option is used.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select the direction that content flows on the page.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is used to set a number for the height, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select the units.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is used to set a number for the height, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control is used to select the units.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control is used to indicate whether the control is hidden.| The AppearanceEditorPart control becomes visible only when a Web Parts page is in edit mode, and when a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has been selected for editing.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |控件用于编辑属性 | |--------------|-----------------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件用于设置标题的文本。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件用于选择使用哪种类型的标题边框选项。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件用于选择在页面的内容流动的方向。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件可用于设置大量的高度，并<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件用于选择的单位。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件可用于设置大量的高度，并<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件用于选择的单位。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件用于指示是否隐藏控件。 | 仅当 Web 部件页处于编辑模式，以及时特定 AppearanceEditorPart 控件将变为可见<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件已被选定以进行编辑。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart control, like all other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, resides in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone.
trans-unit.target: AppearanceEditorPart 控件，像所有其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控制，驻留在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls cannot be placed in any other type of zone.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>区域只能包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件不能放在任何其他类型的区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart class has a minimal set of properties.
trans-unit.target: AppearanceEditorPart 类具有最少属性集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.Title%2A> property is used to get or set a string that is displayed as a title when the control is visible.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.Title%2A>属性用于获取或设置控件是否可见时，显示为标题的字符串。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.Title%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.DefaultButton%2A> property sets the inherited property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control, so that the default control that receives the focus within the AppearanceEditorPart control is the same as the default in the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.DefaultButton%2A>属性设置从的继承的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控制，以便接收到焦点 AppearanceEditorPart 控件内的默认控件中的默认值相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.DefaultButton%2A>

trans-unit.source: The AppearanceEditorPart class also has two important methods.
trans-unit.target: AppearanceEditorPart 类还具有两个重要方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A> method overrides the base method from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>方法重写基方法，从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.SyncChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is critical because it enables getting the property values from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control it is editing and assigning them to the fields in the editor control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是关键的因为它启用获取的属性值从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，它是编辑，并将它们分配到编辑器控件中的字段。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A> method is also important, because it takes the values set by the user in the editing controls, and updates those property values on the control being edited.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>方法也是很重要，因为它会在编辑控件中，用户设置的值并更新正在编辑的控件上的这些属性值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart.ApplyChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: In most cases the AppearanceEditorPart control should be used in page persistence format by declaring an `<asp:appearanceditorpart>` element inside a `<zonetemplate>` element, which is in turn contained by an `<asp:editorzone>` element on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下 AppearanceEditorPart 控件应由以页持久性格式声明`<asp:appearanceditorpart>`内的元素`<zonetemplate>`元素，后者又包含由`<asp:editorzone>`在网页上的元素。

trans-unit.source: To edit other properties and behavior of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can use the other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls supplied with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 若要编辑其他属性和行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，你可以使用其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>随附了 Web 部件控件集的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: These controls include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>.
trans-unit.target: 这些控件包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>、 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PropertyGridEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> controls should provide most editing features required to edit <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, but you can also create a custom editor control by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>控件应提供编辑<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，但你还可以创建通过从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>继承的自定义编辑器控件</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>所需的大多数编辑功能</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>类概述主题。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To improve accessibility, the AppearanceEditorPart control is rendered within a `<fieldset>` element.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 若要提高可访问性，AppearanceEditorPart 时呈现控件内`<fieldset>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The `<fieldset>` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in the AppearanceEditorPart control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software).
trans-unit.target: `<fieldset>`元素进行分组的相关用于在 AppearanceEditorPart 控件中，编辑的控件集并它方便 visual （如普通 Web 浏览器） 和面向语音的用户代理 （如屏幕阅读软件） 的这些控件之间的选项卡式的导航。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 辅助功能默认情况下，对于此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准，如 Web 内容辅助功能准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级别 1 准则。

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Saves the values from an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 值保存<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref>中关联的相应属性的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method is a critical method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: ApplyChanges 方法是在上一个关键方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 就是当用户单击按钮都表示为确定或应用谓词中编辑的用户界面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: The method's purpose is to save the values a user has set on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control to the corresponding properties in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 方法的目的是保存用户已设置的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>中关联的相应属性的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: The associated control is referenced in the inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 引用关联的控件在继承<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.WebPartToEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ApplyChanges method attempts to set the following properties on the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A>
trans-unit.target: ApplyChanges 方法尝试设置以下属性关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the action of saving values from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果保存的操作值从<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref>控制转移到<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件是成功; 否则为 （如果发生错误）， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An error occurs when setting the value for any of the following properties on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is being edited: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.Title*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Direction*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Width*> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Hidden*>
trans-unit.target: 上设置任何下列属性的值时，就会出错<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>正在编辑的控件︰ <> </> *1> <> </> *1> <> </> *1> <> </> *1> <> </> *1><>*>

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base property inherited from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes.
trans-unit.target: 重写继承自基属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref>控件设计器中隐藏该属性，并防止它所影响主题。

trans-unit.source: Though it is public, this property is used for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be called from developer code.
trans-unit.target: 尽管它是公共的此属性将用于此控件的默认呈现，不应从开发人员代码中调用。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> control that receives the default focus in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 包含的 ID 的字符串<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>默认中获得焦点的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the property values from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control and assigns them to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 检索属性值从<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件并将其分配到关联<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is a critical method on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control.
trans-unit.target: SyncChanges 方法是在上一个关键方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: It implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method from the base class, retrieves the current values from the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and updates the controls in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control with those values so a user can edit them.
trans-unit.target: 它实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法从基类中，从关联中检索的当前值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，并更新中的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>使用这些值，以便用户可以对其进行编辑的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart.SyncChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The SyncChanges method is called whenever the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control might have changed.
trans-unit.target: 调用 SyncChanges 方法每当中关联的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件可能已更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> zone that contains the control calls the SyncChanges method, so that the values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control are always synchronized with the values in the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase>区域包含该控件调用 SyncChanges 方法，以便中的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>控件始终中关联的值与同步<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: Another case where the SyncChanges method is called is when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is entering edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 另一种调用 SyncChanges 方法的那是时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件进入编辑模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a title for the editor control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置编辑器控件的标题。

trans-unit.source: The Title property value is displayed in the title bar of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> control when the control is visible in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 标题栏中显示的标题属性值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>控制当控件是否处于编辑模式可见。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>

trans-unit.source: When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the `Title` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 当控件被声明在页中时，你可以设置的值`Title`属性。

trans-unit.source: If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kinds of properties that this control allows users to edit.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供标题的值，用于描述此控件允许用户编辑的属性类型的特定于区域性的默认值。

trans-unit.source: A string that is used as the title of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，使用为该控件的标题。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是由 Web 部件控件集提供的计算的控件名称。
